title: F5 BIG-IP AS3 Settings Declaration
description: A declarative configuration for BIG-IP AS3

asyncTaskStorage.title: Asynchronous Task Storage
asyncTaskStorage.description: Control where asynchronous tasks are stored. Existing tasks are not transferred when the storage type is changed. Storing tasks in a data group persists the data between restarts, but puts more pressure on the control plane.

perAppDeploymentAllowed.title: Per Application Deployment
perAppDeploymentAllowed.description: Whether or not to allow per-application deployments

burstHandlingEnabled.title: Burst Handling Enabled
burstHandlingEnabled.description: A boolean that controls if BIG-IP AS3 on this BIG-IP system uses the Burst Handling feature

performanceTracingEnabled.title: Performance Tracing Enabled
performanceTracingEnabled.description: A boolean that controls if BIG-IP AS3 records performance information. Jaeger client must be installed to enable.

performanceTracingEndpoint.title: Performance Tracing Endpoint
performanceTracingEndpoint.description: Remote endpoint to which performance tracing will send data

serviceDiscoveryEnabled.title: Service Discovery Enabled
serviceDiscoveryEnabled.description: A boolean that controls if Service Discovery features are enabled
